bcModel.xquery: /MDS_GenericDocument[@MDS_EntityType = "{entityType}" AND @MDS_AccountingEntity = "{accountingEntity}" AND @MDS_Location = "{location}" AND @MDS_id1 = "{id1}" AND @MDS_id2 = "{id2}" AND @MDS_id3 = "{id3}" AND @MDS_id4 = "{id4}" AND @MDS_id5 = "{id5}" AND @MDS_id6 = "{id6}" AND @MDS_id7 = "{id7}" AND @MDS_id8 = "{id8}" AND @MDS_id9 = "{id9}" AND @MDS_id10 = "{id10}" AND @MDS_id11 = "{id11}" AND @MDS_id12 = "{id12}" AND @MDS_id13 = "{id13}" AND @MDS_id14 = "{id14}" AND @MDS_id15 = "{id15}"] UNION /MDS_GenericDocument[@MDS_BodRefNoun = "{bodReference.noun}" AND @MDS_BodRefDocId = "{bodReference.documentId}" AND @MDS_BodRefAccEntity = "{bodReference.accountingEntity}" AND @MDS_BodRefLocation = "{bodReference.location}" AND @MDS_BodRefRevisionId = "{bodReference.revisionId}"]
